alert.note: Alert for Southwest Wyoming (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 20 at 3:12PM MST until February 22 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 5 AM MONDAY TO 5 AM MST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 5 inches along the I-80 corridor in Uinta County, Wyoming with up to 8 inches along the northern slope of the Uintas including Lonetree and Robertson. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 6 inches in the Wasatch Back. * WHERE...In Wyoming, Southwest Wyoming. In Utah, Wasatch Back. * WHEN...From 5 AM Monday to 5 AM MST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Winter driving conditions can be expected along all routes.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For graphical depictions of the snowfall forecast, including Official NWS Forecast, High End Amount, and Low End Amount, visit weather.gov/slc/winter. For winter road conditions from the Utah Department of Transportation, visit http://www.udottraffic.utah.gov/roadweatherforecast.aspx or dial 511. For winter road conditions from the Wyoming Department of Transportation, visit http://www.wyoroad.info or dial 511.
